## Problem 1  

```{r longstudy_df, message = FALSE}
# Create a dataframe containing file names.
# Input for extracting file data
longstudy_filenames = 
  tibble(subject = list.files("data")) %>% 
  mutate(subject = str_c("./data/", subject))

longstudy_df = 
  longstudy_filenames %>% 
  mutate(
    subject_data = map(.x = subject, ~read_csv(.x))
  )


```
